snippet.title: Moonrise Hope : Tactics RPG : Alpha Demo Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Moonrise Hope is a indie Tactics RPG currently in late alpha development.
Download FREE demo here : 
Itch.io : https://willfish-dev.itch.io/moonrisehope
Gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/moonrisehope/463975


Ferrum and Trevor are to become "Candiffs", state sanctioned monster hunters. However, there are more than monsters in these ruins. A revival is occurring. A revival blessed by Fate itself.

Moonrise Hope is built to reward creative, expressive play with massive galaxy brain combos and powerful damage effects. At the same time MRH ties in combat with story and characterization through unique mechanics like the morale and hope system.

Follow us on Social Media
https://twitter.com/Riverwolf_dev
https://www.instagram.com/willfish_gamedev/

Game by Troy Adams, William Fisher, and Timothy Ebert
